data.title: Filmpeople - Network for film- and television makers
data.text:
about me

www.bartdokter.nl

ask me for

regie/ scenario/ licht/ storyboard

remarks

2010: Flash Academy; Scenario mini-training screenwriting by Eddy Terstall, Robert Jan Westdijk and Kim van Kooten 2010: Flitsacademie; Acting mini training in acting from Monic Hendrickx, Jaap Spijkers and Martin Koolhoven 2009: Flash Academy; Directing & Film mini training film directing by Eddy Terstall and Martin Koolhoven

trackrecord

2015: 48 Hour Film Project Hamburg position: organiser/city producer 2014-2015: 'Penoza IV' genre: TV series (crime) position: assistant lighting technician 2014-present: 'Never again you' genre: video clip artist: Sharon Kips position : ao animation, direction 2014: '48 HFP Leeuwarden Promo' genre: commercial cast: ao Wybo Smids, Mirjam Timmer, Rense Westra function: ao screenplay, production, direction 2014: 'Lead-free' genre: short film (Comedy) (NTR KORT !) position: lighting technician 2014: 'Basile H.' genre: short film (drama) (NTR One Night Stand) function: lighting technician 2013: 'Stuk!' genre: cinema film (youth thriller) function: best boy 2013: '48HFP Leeuwarden Promo' genre: commercial cast: Steven de Jong, Pieter Verhoeff, Mirjam de With function: editing, directing 2013-present: 48 Hour Film Project Leeuwarden function: organizer /cityproducer 2012-2013: 'Poster' genre: short silent film (opening film NVFF 2013) cast: Raymond Thiry, Miryanna van Reeden functions: screenplay, production, editing/vfx, direction 2011: 'Frank' (48 Hour Film Project Utrecht ) genre: superhero cast: Hugo Metsers, Teun Kuilboer, Ronald van Elderen, Erik de Vries function: script, production, direction 2010: 'Curriculum Vitae' (48 Hour Film Project Utrecht) genre: sci-fi cast: Guus Dam , Dorien Rose, Ruth Bakker function: ao screenplay, production, direction 2010: 'Stichting Present' genre: infomercials cast: ao ambassador Linda Wagenmakers function: direction, editing 2009-2010: 'Mental Jewelery' genre: short film (drama) cast : Fleur van der Kieft, Linda Wagenmakers, Eric Bouwman, Dorien Rose function: o a screenplay, production, editing, direction 2006-2008: 'Wielklem' genre: short film (drama) cast: ao Birgit Schuurman, Suzanne Spliethoff, Andre Dongelmans, Lianne Zandstra function: ao screenplay, production, direction

awards

2011: Dutch Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Winner Best Director for “Frank” 2011: Netherlands Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Nomination best cinematography for “Frank” 2011: Netherlands Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Best Supporting Actor Nomination; Teun Kuilboer for “Frank” 2011: Netherlands Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Nomination best director for “Frank” 2011: Netherlands Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Nomination best script for “Frank” 2011: Netherlands Film Festival; 48 Hour Film Project: Nomination best music for “Frank” 2010: Ronde Venen Open: Winner Gouden Turfsteker for “Mental Jewelery”
